sentences.sentence: John Lee has been elected to replace Carrie Lam as leader in Hong Kong, in a process that's already been called a violation of democracy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Dozens of people are feared dead and injured after a Russian strike destroyed a school in the village of Bilgorivka in Ukraine's eastern Luhansk region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The regional governor said the building was struck by a bomb from a Russian plane on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Serhii Hadai added that two fatalities have been confirmed, but he feared a further 60 victims could be buried under the rubble.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Around 30 people are reported to have been rescued.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Journalists have so far been unable to verify the governor's claims, and as yet, there's been no response from Moscow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: But it is well documented that some of the most intense fighting in recent days has been in eastern Ukraine, where the two sides are entrenched in a fierce battle to capture or reclaim territory.

sentences.sentence: Russia's defense ministry said that missiles had destroyed Ukrainian aircraft at airfields in the Artsyv, Odessa and Votenetsk regions, and that its Iskander missiles struck U.S. and European equipment near Kharkiv.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And according to international observers, Moscow aims to completely capture Maripol in time for Russia's Victory Day celebrations on May 9. The U.S. First Lady Jill Biden and her Romanian counterpart, Carmen Ioannis, visited a school

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: in Bucharest on Saturday where Ukrainian refugee children are being educated.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Two thousand such children have signed up to attend classes in Romanian schools.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: As well as education authorities, the two first ladies talked with Ukrainian teachers and mothers.

Jill Biden then flew on to Slovakia to meet more Ukrainian refugees, as well as aid workers and local residents in the city of Kursiƒçia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The First Lady was also due to meet U.S. Embassy staff and Slovakian officials in the capital, Bratislava.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: On Sunday, French President Emmanuel Macron commemorated the 77th anniversary of the Allied

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: victory over Nazi Germany in World War II. The ceremony, which took place in Paris, held particular significance amid the ongoing war in Ukraine and ahead of Russia's annual military parade in Moscow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile Germany's Bundestag President, Barbel Bas, arrived in Kiev to meet President Zelensky and to attend a memorial event honouring the anniversary of the end of World War II.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Ahead of Russia's Victory Day celebrations, state media reported that Vladimir Putin praised the people of Ukraine for what he said was their continued fight against Nazism.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Final Victory Day rehearsals took place in Moscow on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: To commemorate what Russia calls the Great Patriotic War, thousands of soldiers, tanks and armoured vehicles are set to parade across the capital's Red Square.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Hong Kong has a new leader to replace outgoing Chief Executive Carrie Lam.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: He's John Lee, a hardline security chief who oversaw the crackdown on Hong Kong's pro-democracy movement. Lee was elected on Sunday with over 99% of the vote by a 1,500-strong pro-Beijing committee. He was the only candidate, which led to immediate criticism from some quarters. In a tweet, the EU's High Representative for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy, Josep Borrell, said Li's election violated democratic principles, adding that the process was another step in the dismantling of the one country, two systems principle.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Li will replace current leader Carrie Lam on July 1st.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Her five-year term was marked by huge pro-democracy protests over the increasing influence of Beijing in Hong Kong affairs. The resulting crackdown quashed virtually all dissent and undermined the city's reputation as an international business hub.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Hundreds of thousands of people dressed in pink and marched through the streets of Manila.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The crowds are part of a movement dubbed the Pink Revolution. They are rallying in support of the Philippines' Vice President, Lenny Robredo, ahead of the country's presidential election on Monday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: We believe that the voice of the people should be in this place today because we believe that the majority of the Filipino people, especially women, support Lenny Robredo and believe that in her governance, the women had a voice and the women had a place in this society.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Robredo is currently polling in second place, behind the son of the former dictator Ferdinand Marcos.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: She's trying to make a historical turnaround under the banner of reformism.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Her main competitor, Marcos Jr., is currently polling at 56 percent.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And that worries human rights activists and religious leaders.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: That is because his father ruled the country for years with an iron fist before he was removed from office by a populist uprising.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Despite this shadow, Marcos Jr. is embracing the former dictator's image, and he's portraying his father's time in office as a period of national pride and prosperity.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The breadbasket of Europe is under threat.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Ukraine is one of the world's largest producers of sunflower oil, wheat, rapeseed and maize.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: However, Ukrainian vessels exporting grain cannot set sail.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: With their ports blocked by the conflict, they are now looking to Constanta in Romania.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Trains, lorries and barges are being used to transport the goods to the strategic port city.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The UN's Food and Agriculture Organization says nearly 25 million tonnes of grain are currently stuck in the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The FAO claims that Moscow's troops are also looting storage facilities and transporting the grain back to Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Bulgaria says it will help export Ukrainian stocks from its port in Varna and is currently upgrading its infrastructure.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In the meantime, Constanta is moving the cargo as fast as it can.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: According to Viorel Panayyt, manager of Convex Transport Company, the first ship loaded with 70,000 tons of Ukrainian corn left the Romanian port at the end of April.

sentences.sentence: There is a general feeling of compassion for the unfortunate situation in Ukraine.

sentences.sentence: We all feel the need to help them as much as we can." The port's manager says the war in Ukraine is a challenge but also an opportunity.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Slowly, corridors are being created to bring goods to the port of Constanta and help with exports.

sentences.sentence: It's very important now to help Ukraine's exports to support its economy." Meanwhile farmers in Ukraine are feeling the pressure.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
